Summary: big black clyander moving slowly across the sky could tell it was there becuse it was blocking out the stars

divs: Sighting Detailsi went outside to take out some trash.I heard a hum and looked up didnt see anything i went into my drive way and noticed stars were popping up i relized it was that something ws blocking it.this thing was as long as a house!!it moved maybe around 5 miles an hour maybe slower it barly made anysound what so ever i had to realy concentrait to hear it it was shape like a oval or circle i couldnt realy move for some reason so i couldnt run inside to get a camera. then it speed up after maybe 20 minutes it was over me then in like 5 secs in was gone
